channel.title: works on Georgios Karamanis
channel.description: Recent content in works on Georgios Karamanis

item.title: What's on your head
item.description: A week ago I attended a street photography workshop with Eric Kim at Fotografiska in Stockholm. Lots of inspiration and nice people. I didn't make the best images but I went way out of my comfort zone which is always good! Here are the photos of the project I had.
